comment: This professor is one of the best professors in the Department of Humanities. She is well versed and has a multitude of knowledge. Take her if you want to learn and make a good grade at the same time.

Dr. Omotunde is a very fascinating professor. She is very enthusiastic about learning and she makes you just as excited to learn. If you turn in your assignment's and come to class regularly you will make an A. You will also learn a lot!!
